price: Hakika walio dhulumu wana fungu lao la adhabu kama fungu la wenzao. Basi wasinihimize.
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
footnotes: Hakika hao walio jidhulumu nafsi zao kwa ukafiri na kukanusha wana fungu lao la adhabu mfano wa fungu la wenzao katika kaumu zilizo kwisha pita. Basi wasifanye haraka kuhimiza adhabu ishuke kabla ya wakati wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
